alert.note: Alert for Desha; Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 05 at 4:36PM CDT until May 05 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 435 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ladelle, or 12 miles south of Monticello, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Monticello... Dermott... Green Hill... Ladelle... McGehee... Prairie Grove... Jerome... Baxter... New Hope in Drew County... Collins... Enon... Lacey... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
